dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.policy.fmk.PolicyDomain
dataStructure.description:
A PolicyDomain is a collection of entities and services that are administered in a coordinated fashion using a set of policies. The policies are used to control the set of services and entities according to a common methodology, such as a finite state machine.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: PolicyDomain

child.name: policyApplication
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ScopedPolicyDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: policyApplication
